item.title: Itaewon Class
item.description: How to get revenge… wait and then wait some more Take a peak into the social status hiearchy Yangban. On another day you think you could be watching the revenge tail from Parasite

item.description: Style Demo h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Deleted text This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$ Heading Another heading text text text text text text Block quotes are written like so.

item.title: Me?
item.description: So I’m Chris On this site you will find my blog pertaining to teaching, society and my experiences You will also find my notes and musing on a range of books, mostly non fiction Thoughts and musings on Kdramas will also be discussed in the hope of converting more people away from Western Cinema If any of the content has been helpful, feel free to Monzo Me a coffee I do the following, but not in order or equal amounts Pace around school as the person in charge of History Speak Chinese with a Tianjin accent Drink Trung Nguyen with a Vietnamese phin Highlight pdfs or books on Kindle with the intent of making detailed notes On the odd occasion i’ll make a YouTube video If any of the above resonates with you, get in touch
